'''Mythcon 42''' was the forty-second annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Monsters, Marvels, and Minstrels: The Rise of Modern Medievalism"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Michael D.C. Drout]] (professor), and Catherynne M. Valente (fantasy author)
